sentence.Network_en: I was under the misapprehension that the course was for complete beginners.
sentence.Network_cn: 我误以为这门课是给纯粹的初学者开的。

sentence.Network_en: He laboured under the constant misapprehension that nobody liked him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他总是误认为没有人喜欢他.

sentence.Network_en: We were by now under no misapprehension about the extent of the problem.
sentence.Network_cn: 到目前为止，我们对问题的严重程度的理解并无偏差。

PerfectNetExp.abs: misapplication 误用misapprehension 误解misappropriation 侵吞
《傲慢与偏见》= 表面上的傲慢引起的misunderstanding或misapprehension(误会),之所以是误会就是因为是表面傲慢而不是真的傲慢,由于ignorance(无知)而产生的误会就是.

list.abs: on some misapprehension used to resection ., 关于后方交会的一些误区.

it is the reason that the government and people at China and Japan lack of mutual understanding and recognition . so they are making lapse into the vicious circle of mutual misapprehension .其原因是中日政府和人民相互了解不够，相互认识不足，使双方关系进入了“相互误解”的恶性循环之中。
to avoid misapprehension , I am going to ask all of you to repeat the instructions I have given .为了避免误解，我想请诸位复述一下我所作的指示。
She could not attribute such behaviour to mistake or misapprehension of any kind ., 她也不能把这种行为归之任何的误会或误解.

entry.def: A misapprehension is a wrong idea or impression that you have about something.

example.ex: Men still appear to be labouring under the misapprehension that women want hairy, muscular men...
example.tran: 男人们似乎仍然错误地认为女人喜欢体毛浓重、肌肉强健的男人。

example.ex: We were by now under no misapprehension about the extent of the problem.
example.tran: 到目前为止，我们对问题的严重程度的理解并无偏差。

means.word_mean: 1. an understanding of something that is not correct;

sentences.sentence: "he wasn't going to admit his mistake"
"there must be some misunderstanding--I don't have a sister"
